reviewText:
This is an excellent resource for the beautiful kata of Shorin Ryu. A very valuable supplement to Kyoshi Vellucci's home study material. I highly recommend this dvd to all karateka seeking to explore the pureness and power of Okinawan Shorin Ryu.
Thank you Kyoshi Vellucci

I recommend this DVD to any serious Karateka who would like to add to their training/review collection. Kyoshi Vellucci's kata are sharp and well presented. I've known Kyoshi Vellucci since 1993 and have always admired his crisp kata and kobudo performances. He has aged a bit since our Atsugi (Ebina), Japan days, but that was expected. :) Nice Job Kyoshi! Kyoshi Michael Tobin, founder Mendocino Okinawan Shorin-ryu Karate Association and member World Okinawan Shorin-ryu Karate and Kobudo Association.
